price: Затим, поново више пута погледај, поглед ће да ти се врати клонуо и уморан.
arabic: ثُمَّ ٱرۡجِعِ ٱلۡبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيۡنِ يَنقَلِبۡ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَصَرُ خَاسِئٗا وَهُوَ حَسِيرٞ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: thumma ir'jiʿi al-baṣara karratayni yanqalib ilayka al-baṣaru khāsi-an wahuwa ḥasīrun
